name: get_user_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitch_api.
Tool description: Detailed API for twitch. Stream data, streamer data, chat data, streamer cards data etc.
for twitch.
API description: Fetches the user ID for a given Twitch channel using the Twitch API.

channel.description: The Twitch channel name for which to fetch the user ID.
